findings.title: Container Runs as Root
findings.description: Dockerfile is configured to run as root, increasing attack surface.

findings.title: Missing Dependencies Lockfile
findings.description: No lockfile found, risking dependency confusion attacks or breaking changes.

short_term: Implement git-secrets or similar pre-commit hooks.
Update Dockerfile to creating a non-root user.
Generate lockfile (e.g., pip freeze > requirements.txt or poetry lock).
